attributes.action: Give all of the rest of the UK the same amout of Bank Holidays to the level in Northern Ireland (UK)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why is it England & Wales get less Bank Holidays then in Scotland & Northern Ireland. All the UK should be equal and get the same amount of Bank/Public Holidays, It's not fair and it's not right. I feel like a Second Class Citizen for the crime of being Born & Bread English..
